data.title: Connecting STEM Society Professionals
data.meta_description: CESSE is the professional community bringing together association professionals from scientific, technological, engineering, and mathematical societies.
data.text:
Grow Your Knowledge in the Association Industry

Registration is open for association basics training

Ready to take your association leadership skills to the next level? Join the Association Basics Training, a comprehensive program tailored for professionals like you.

Over two interactive 4-hour Zoom sessions, you'll delve deep into the fundamentals of associations, exploring their structure, governance, and key activities. Led by seasoned professionals from the CESSE community, this training offers you the tools and knowledge to enhance your effectiveness. Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to grow your expertise and connect with fellow association professionals!

Register for an Upcoming Session

Networking, Education, and the Sharing of Best Practices

A Trusted Community

The Council of Engineering and Scientific Society Executives (CESSE) is the professional home for hundreds of STEM society CEOs and staff who value the trusted network and experience of their peers. Committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion CESSE fosters a welcoming community based on mutual respect, shared learning, and a commitment to action; dedicated to advancing DEI in all we do.
